name: Kids School Bus Learning Driver 3d simulator
name_original: Kids School Bus Learning Driver 3d simulator
description:
Kids School Bus Learning Driver

All the kids are waiting for the school driver to arrive and pick them up. Please remember to always drive safe because your job brings
many responsibilities. Drop the children at school before the final horn rings.

City School Bus Driver 3D is a Schoolbus driving 3D simulator game for everyone that would like to keep those driving skills up to date,
you need to practice everything from parking, reversing and use your mental skills to keep calm.
Steer the school bus carefully, rush past the traffic and don’t be late! Follow all of the traffic regulations, stop when traffic lights are red
and avoid hitting other cars on the road!

Key features:

- Awesome Bus driving challenges
- Smooth controls and fun gameplay
- Drive different types of school buses
- Massive 3D Suburban City environments
- Realistic City traffic
